titleStmt.title: By the Quenes Maiestie. Elizabeth by the grace of God Quene of Englande Fraunce and Ireland, defendour of the fayth. [et]c [...]
Proclamations. 1558-11-17
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By [John Day for?] Rychard Iugge printer vnto the Quenes higtnes,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation on the accession of Queen Elizabeth.
Publication date and proposed name of printer from STC.
At foot of page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
